mito -use http src.cel
! stderr .
cmp stdout want.txt

-- src.cel --
request("GET", "http://www.example.com/").basic_authentication("username", "password")
-- want.txt --
{
	"Close": false,
	"ContentLength": 0,
	"Header": {
		"Authorization": [
			"Basic dXNlcm5hbWU6cGFzc3dvcmQ="
		]
	},
	"Host": "www.example.com",
	"Method": "GET",
	"Proto": "HTTP/1.1",
	"ProtoMajor": 1,
	"ProtoMinor": 1,
	"URL": "http://www.example.com/"
}
